backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining users, fields, and tasks with authorization checks, CRUD operations, and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Deployment and local development checklist covering build validation, smoke tests, and core functionality checks.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide describing reproducible steps and expected behavior for field creation failure scenarios.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook outlining steps and prerequisites for performing a clean production redeploy.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording results of production smoke tests across authentication, CRUD, and UI flows.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documentation of the profile save failure issue, root cause, fixes, and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point rendering a root div and loading bootstrap and main React scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor/profile boot logic, and rendering appropriate UI or error flows.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Bootstrap fallback system that displays a custom error UI if the app fails before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Sets up global shims and environment variables before loading React, then initializes the boot fallback system.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Task list view with search, sorting, and loading states, rendering all tasks with field lookups.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with login handling, backend readiness checks, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog component for creating a new task with name, numeric attributes, duration, and dependencies, then submitting via useCreateTask.
Dialog for editing a field’s name, icon, color, and background, updating it through useUpdateField.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s fields, attributes, duration, dependencies, and optionally moving it to another field.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a field summary card with icon, color, task count, and averaged task attributes.
Detailed view of a field showing its stats, sortable/searchable tasks, and dialogs for creating, editing, or deleting the field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu with logout support.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: A confirmation dialog warning users before overwriting all existing fields and tasks with imported data.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen listing app features and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal for entering and saving a user name, handling authentication and backend initialization states.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows a recoverable boot error with retry, logout, and expandable diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: A button that toggles sort direction with tooltip feedback.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with attributes, completion, editing, deletion, and dependency display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, fields, tasks, and export/import data with detailed error handling and identity scoping.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with retry logic and query invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables including field background palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI for listing, searching, sorting, and managing fields and tasks, plus data import/export controls.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to detect specific backend error patterns and extract user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Exports a utility that serializes data to JSON (handling BigInt) and triggers a client‑side file download.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Provides helpers to convert durations between units and format minutes into a readable string.
Normalizes various export-user-data errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines preset icons and colors and includes helpers to resolve icon components and color values.
Lists available field card background IDs and provides helpers to resolve background objects and CSS variables.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Maps field-creation-related errors into brief, categorized messages with login and authorization checks.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed payload objects, restoring Principals and BigInts with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors, handling login, actor state, authorization traps, and unknown cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, layout options, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state including UI improvement requests, known issues, and pending feature additions for layout, colors, and icons.
